welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tawau, Malaysia! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's charm, known for its rich cultural heritage, stunning natural beauty, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tawau has to offer.

restaurants.address: Jalan Sungai Tanjung, Tawau, Sabah, Sabah
